name: Tap to Spin
description:
Tap to Spin is a hard and addictive mobile game for Android (IOS coming soon!) that will keep you on edge as you try to keep the needle in the green while the level rotates and shrinks.

This is my first game release so any feedback is greatly appreciated.

Features:

  • Addicting and challenging gameplay
  • One hand gameplay
  • Random level movement makes every game different
  • Free to play

How to play:

  • Tap to change the arrow's direction.
  • Keep the tips of the arrow in the green.
  • Have fun!
